sentences.en: An adverse economic forecast will stimulate action intended to falsify it.
sentences.cn: 不利的经济预报将会刺激人们作出使预报失灵的行动.

sentences.en: Exogenous applications of indoleacetic acid, kinetin or gibberellic acid stimulate photosynthesis.
sentences.cn: 吲哚乙酸, 激动素或赤霉酸的外源施用刺激了光合作用.

sentences.en: Guitar's experiments did not stimulate any practical study of the electrostatic - precipitation principle.
sentences.cn: 吉他的试验均未能激起任何关于电收尘原理的实用性研究.

sentences.en: Her interest in art was stimulated by her father.
sentences.cn: 她对艺术的兴趣是她父亲激发的。

sentences.en: In a series of minutes I tried to stimulate the work.
sentences.cn: 我通过一连串的备忘录竭力推动这项工作.

sentences.en: She is taking a drug to stimulate ovulation.
sentences.cn: 她现正服药使排卵正常.

sentences.en: She questioned whether it was feasible to stimulate investment in these regions.
sentences.cn: 她对在这些地区刺激投资是否可行表示怀疑。

sentences.en: Stimulate the site of greatest pain with a small negative current.
sentences.cn: 以微弱负电流刺激疼得最厉害的部位。

sentences.en: Success will stimulate the people for fresh efforts.
sentences.cn: 成功能鼓舞人们去作新的努力.

sentences.en: Tariffs provide protection and thus stimulate domestic production.
sentences.cn: 关税提供了保护,从而促进了国内的生产.

sentences.en: The EEC further stimulate the renaissance of Western Europe.
sentences.cn: 这一共同体进一步刺激了西欧的复兴.

sentences.en: the President’s plan to stimulate economic growth
sentences.cn: 总统刺激经济增长的计划

sentences.en: These businesses stimulate the creation of local jobs.
sentences.cn: 这些企业有助于为当地创造更多就业机会。

sentences.en: These proteins stimulate the production of blood cells.
sentences.cn: 这些蛋白质会刺激血细胞的产生。

sentences.en: They counted on foreign investment to stimulate their economy.
sentences.cn: 他们想依靠外国投资来刺激他们的经济.

sentences.en: This medicine will help stimulate the function of the patient's organs.
sentences.cn: 这种药有助于促进病人的器官功能.

sentences.en: Your encouragement will stimulate me to further efforts.
sentences.cn: 你的鼓励会激发我进一步努力.

words.tran_cn: [药] 兴奋剂；刺激物；酒精饮料
刺激（stimulate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to encourage or help an activity to begin or develop further

trans.tran_cn: 起兴奋作用，起促进作用，起刺激作用

trans.tran_en: to encourage or help an activity to begin or develop further
